channel.description: Recent content in R on Susan's DS Blog

item.title: Time Series
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Loading required package: proto ## Loading required package: RSQLite library(ggplot2) ## Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.4.2 Now weâ€™ll plot a Time Series Chart (which is two sets of data compared to each other but one set of data is time): query<-"SELECT HR,yearID FROM Batting WHERE playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) ggplot()+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ ggtitle("Babe Ruth's Homeruns Over The Span of His Career")+ xlab("Year")+ ylab("Number of Homeruns")

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
